name: PokemonEpisode.org cleanup

Changelog:
20-03-2013: (v3.5) Removed support for (dead) FamilyGuy/Futurama/Simpsons/SouthPark/OnePiece sites. Fixed Episode button hover (hover image gives a 404, this fixes that bug).
24-01-2012: CSS clean up
18-11-2011: Fixed element blocking rules, added Widescreen feature
02-06-2011: v2: Fixed page being chopped off at the bottom, now hides next-page link if first page of site.
02-06-2011: Fixed Facebook like button shoving the Episode button down
30-01-2011: v2: Fixed userscript appearing on all webpages in the menu of Stylish
30-01-2011: Minor update
03-10-2010: Removed Facebok button on top of the page, moved the other faceook button to a better place.
30-09-2010: Added support for TSEpisode.org (The Simpsons Episode)
19-09-2010: Added support for OPEpisode.org (OnePiece Episode)
24-08-2010: [MAJOR] Now supports Fe, SPe, FGe and DBZe.
24-08-2010: [MINOR]Reduced Episode summary a bit.
